DIY Dental Care: In the absence of dentists, people would have to rely on DIY dental care methods. This could include using natural ingredients like baking soda and vinegar to clean teeth, flossing regularly, and using mouthwash to kill bacteria.

Oral Hygiene Products: With no dentists, people would have to rely on oral hygiene products to keep their teeth clean and healthy. This could include using electric toothbrushes, dental floss, mouthwash, and toothpaste.
At-Home Dental Procedures: In the absence of dentists, people could perform at-home dental procedures like filling cavities, removing teeth, and whitening teeth.
Natural Remedies: People could also turn to natural remedies to take care of their teeth, such as using eucalyptus oil to freshen breath and reduce inflammation.
Alternative Medicine: Alternative medicine practices like acupuncture and herbal remedies could be used to promote oral health and prevent tooth decay.
